biotools.summary: Screening populations for copy number variation using genotyping-by-sequencing | Detection of deletions and duplications from GBS data | delgbs is an R package which provides tools for detecting copy number variation from genotyping-by-sequencing (GBS) data. delgbs bases its CNV calls on the number of reads per sample in discrete bins (e.g. 1-kb bins) located along a reference genome

bioschemas.name: GBS
bioschemas.summary: Screening populations for copy number variation using genotyping-by-sequencing | Detection of deletions and duplications from GBS data | delgbs is an R package which provides tools for detecting copy number variation from genotyping-by-sequencing (GBS) data. delgbs bases its CNV calls on the number of reads per sample in discrete bins (e.g. 1-kb bins) located along a reference genome
